overview: Excitement streaks through the halls of the sorority dorm room when hard-working student, Sinn Sage moves in. Adriana begins to feel the tension from the other girls who aren't crazy about her inviting the new girl to move in. Dylan demands satisfaction from her lover Adriana to prove Sinn isn't a threat. Sovereign takes it upon herself to reassure the nervous Sinn that it's only Sinn's gorgeous looks that have set the others on edge. But how will Sovereign's tough girlfriend, Drew, deal with this competition? With all the female insanity, Sinn should be glad to finally have the luscious Skin to warm up to. With a combination of sensual femininity and confident lesbianism, Lesbian Sorority raises the bar for girl on girl erotic cinema. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Lesbian Sorority
